title: Novel nanorod oxidation catalysts
abstractText: The aim is to exploit a recent discovery concerning the production of a new high activity catalyst for use in the production of formaldehyde from the oxidation of methanol using a novel nanorod catalysts. These new catalysts have been protected by a patent filing. The key feature of these catalysts is that they give higher yields that the current commercial catalysts. Funding is requested to complete patent exemplification and to ensure commercial exploitation can be achieved.
impactText: We have discovered a new way of making oxide nanorods that can be used as catalysts for methanol oxidation Chemicals Economic
findingsText: A new method of making nanorods that can be used as catalysts for the manufacture of formadehyde from methanol oxidation We are in discussions with a potential industry partner Chemicals
